title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Integrated Learning Design via WhatsApp for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and intermediate-level digital literacy
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Within six months, learners will design and implement a structured knowledge-sharing protocol via WhatsApp in medical education settings meeting the following: 1) include at least three medical terminology definition and sharing guidelines, 2) implement a weekly knowledge-sharing checklist with five or more items, 3) achieve an average of 4 points or higher in participant feedback surveys (5-point Likert scale).
Learners complete real medical case analysis projects with an 80%+ completion rate through WhatsApp-based asynchronous collaboration
Learners measure learning effectiveness using self-assessment tools based on Kirkpatrick Model Levels 1–2 (Reaction/Learning)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
